General.Name: Sapphire Foods India Limited
General.Description: Sapphire Foods India Limited owns and operates restaurants in India and internationally. It also engages in the franchisee business. The company owns and operates KFC and Pizza Hut restaurants in India, Pizza Hut and Taco Bell restaurants in Sri Lanka, and KFC and Pizza Hut restaurant in Maldives. The company was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Mumbai, India.

7.Name: Mr. Amit  Sharma
7.Title: Sr. VP & Head of Supply Chain Management
